summary: A young woman looks to escape her abusive life by moving to a friend's farm near Atlanta. Unfortunately, she learns her place of supposed comfort offers more terrifying forms of abuse.
cast: Lucy Holt|Amy Shiels|David Sterne|Antonia Bernath|Craig Robert Young|Andrei Aradits|Ingrid Bisu|Vance Daniels|Cristinel Hogas|Maxim Knight|C.J. Singer|Denis Stefan|Cosmin Dominte
title: Slaughter
